# removeAllItems()

**Instance Method**

Removes all items in the receiver’s item menu.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeAllItems()
```

## Adding and removing items

- **addItem(withTitle:)**: Adds an item with the specified title to the end of the menu.
- **addItems(withTitles:)**: Adds multiple items to the end of the menu.
- **insertItem(withTitle:at:)**: Inserts an item at the specified position in the menu.
- **removeItem(withTitle:)**: Removes the item with the specified title from the menu.
- **removeItem(at:)**: Removes the item at the specified index.

items.description: Adds an item with the specified title to the end of the menu.
items.name: addItem(withTitle:)

items.description: Adds multiple items to the end of the menu.
items.name: addItems(withTitles:)

items.description: Inserts an item at the specified position in the menu.
items.name: insertItem(withTitle:at:)

items.description: Removes the item with the specified title from the menu.
items.name: removeItem(withTitle:)

items.description: Removes the item at the specified index.
items.name: removeItem(at:)
